languages.text: "Не принимайте сказанное близко к сердцу — это обычная вежливость".

traits.locale_text: "Не принимайте сказанное близко к сердцу — это обычная вежливость".

languages.text: "Do not take my words to heart — they were born of common courtesy."
languages.original_text: "Не принимайте сказанное близко к сердцу — это обычная вежливость".

traits.locale_text: "Do not take my words to heart — they were born of common courtesy."
"Do not take my words to heart — they were born of common courtesy."
"Do not take my words to heart — they were born of common courtesy."
"Do not take my words to heart — they were born of common courtesy."

languages.text: “别把这些话放在心上，我说这些仅仅是出于礼节而已。”
languages.original_text: "Do not take my words to heart — they were born of common courtesy."

traits.locale_text: “别把这些话放在心上，我说这些仅仅是出于礼节而已。”

languages.text: «No se tome muy a pecho mis palabras. Son fruto de la cortesía básica».
languages.original_text: "Do not take my words to heart — they were born of common courtesy."

traits.locale_text: «No se tome muy a pecho mis palabras. Son fruto de la cortesía básica».

languages.text: 「私の言葉を真に受けないでくれ…それらは、一般的な社交儀礼の産物だ」
languages.original_text: "Do not take my words to heart — they were born of common courtesy."

traits.locale_text: 「私の言葉を真に受けないでくれ…それらは、一般的な社交儀礼の産物だ」

languages.text: "Nehmt Euch meine Worte nicht zu Herzen — sie sind aus gewöhnlicher Höflichkeit entstanden."
languages.original_text: "Do not take my words to heart — they were born of common courtesy."

traits.locale_text: "Nehmt Euch meine Worte nicht zu Herzen — sie sind aus gewöhnlicher Höflichkeit entstanden."

languages.text: « Ne prenez pas mes paroles trop à cœur. Elles ne sont que le produit de la courtoisie la plus élémentaire. »
languages.original_text: "Do not take my words to heart — they were born of common courtesy."

traits.locale_text: « Ne prenez pas mes paroles trop à cœur. Elles ne sont que le produit de la courtoisie la plus élémentaire. »

languages.text: "Dediklerimi o kadar ciddiye alma. Nezaketen sarf edilmiş sözlerden ibaretler."
languages.original_text: "Do not take my words to heart — they were born of common courtesy."

traits.locale_text: "Dediklerimi o kadar ciddiye alma... Nezaketen dedim."
